crnrstn_element.crnrstn_description: Inspired by the NuSOAP WDSLCLIENT4.PHP sample file, the soap_manager :: class of the CRNRSTN Suite :: sits directly on top of the NuSOAP (0.9.5) PHP Toolkit for web services (SOAP server/client) support and development. When the soap_manager class is instantiated, an instance of a NuSOAP web services client (within the constructor of the soap_manager) will be created as well. This can be customized for different SOAP client (or connection) types as needed.

crnrstn_techspecscontent.crnrstn_techspec:
INSPIRATION :: WSDLCLIENT4.PHP,v 1.6 2005/05/12 21:42:06 SNICHOL EEP
WSDL CLIENT SAMPLE, BASED ON SOAP BUILDERS ROUND 2 INTEROP
SERVICE :: WSDL || PAYLOAD :: RPC/ENCODED || TRANSPORT :: HTTP || AUTHENTICATION :: NONE
Currently tested on an Ubuntu Server 16.04 running PHP 7.0.22 and Redhat Linux running PHP 5.5.38.
It is recommended that you upgrade to the latest version of PHP to take advantage of the latest gains in security and processing efficiency.

crnrstn_parameter.crnrstn_paramdefinition: The CRNRSTN Suite :: environmentals :: class object.
